queryMap.query: SELECT TOG.MOT_NO , COUNT(TOG.MOT_NO) CNT_RACE , MAX(TOG.INTRO_RUN_TM) MAX_INTRO_RUN_TM , MIN(TOG.INTRO_RUN_TM) MIN_INTRO_RUN_TM , MAX(TOG.INTRO_RUN_TM) - MIN(TOG.INTRO_RUN_TM) DEV_INTRO_RUN_TM , ROUND(AVG(TOG.INTRO_RUN_TM), 2) AVG_INTRO_RUN_TM FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOG WHERE TOG.MBR_CD = ? AND TOG.STND_YEAR || LPAD(TO_CHAR(TOG.TMS), 2, '0') >= ? || LPAD(?, 2, '0') AND TOG.STND_YEAR || LPAD(TO_CHAR(TOG.TMS), 2, '0') <= ? || LPAD(?, 2, '0') GROUP BY TOG.MOT_NO ORDER BY TOG.MOT_NO

SELECT TOG.STND_YEAR , TOG.MBR_CD , TOG.TMS , TOG.DAY_ORD , TOG.RACE_NO , TOG.RACE_REG_NO , TRM.NM_KOR --선수명 , TRM.RACER_GRD_CD --등급 , TRD.WGHT --체중 , TOG.BOAT_NO , TOG.INTRO_RUN_TM FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOG INNER JOIN TBEC_RACER_MASTER TRM ON TOG.RACER_NO = TRM.RACER_NO LEFT JOIN TBEC_RACER_DETAIL TRD ON TRM.RACER_NO = TRD.RACER_NO WHERE TOG.MBR_CD = ? AND TOG.STND_YEAR || LPAD(TO_CHAR(TOG.TMS), 2, '0') >= ? || LPAD(?, 2, '0') AND TOG.STND_YEAR || LPAD(TO_CHAR(TOG.TMS), 2, '0') <= ? || LPAD(?, 2, '0') AND TOG.MOT_NO = ? ORDER BY TOG.STND_YEAR, TOG.TMS, TOG.DAY_ORD, TOG.RACE_NO DESC
